readme:
# 💫 About Me: Hello! My name is Yash Chennawar, and I am an aspiring ML Engineer passionate about artificial intelligence, machine learning, and software engineering, with a keen interest in quantum computing. I am pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Mathematics at Rutgers University–New Brunswick Honors College.

Currently, I am working as an Undergraduate Research Assistant at Rutgers, where I am developing brain-inspired neural networks to push the boundaries of AI and deep learning. My research focuses on innovative approaches to neural network training and pattern discrimination learning tasks.

I have a strong love for coding and development. My technical skills include:
- Languages: Python, Java, C, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
- Frameworks and Tools: PyTorch, TensorFlow, LangChain, OpenAI API, Unity, Git

I have worked on various projects, including developing a personalized book recommendation system using machine learning and creating VR applications for healthcare professionals. I am constantly learning new languages, frameworks, and principles to enhance my skills further.

I would love to collaborate on projects so feel free to reach out! ## 🌐 Socials: [![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-%230077B5.svg?logo=linkedin&logoColor=white)](https://linkedin.com/in/yashchennawar) # 💻 Tech Stack: ![C](https://img.shields.io/badge/c-%2300599C.svg?style=flat&logo=c&logoColor=white) ![C#](https://img.shields.io/badge/c%23-%23239120.svg?style=flat&logo=csharp&logoColor=white) ![C++](https://img.shields.io/badge/c++-%2300599C.svg?style=flat&logo=c%2B%2B&logoColor=white) ![HTML5](https://img.shields.io/badge/html5-%23E34F26.svg?style=flat&logo=html5&logoColor=white) ![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/java-%23ED8B00.svg?style=flat&logo=openjdk&logoColor=white) ![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/javascript-%23323330.svg?style=flat&logo=javascript&logoColor=%23F7DF1E) ![LaTeX](https://im
